Sure! Here is a marketing plan for a small snow removal business located in Chicago:

1. Identify your target market: Consider who is most likely to need your snow removal services. This could include residential homeowners, commercial property owners, and possibly even government agencies or schools.
2. Develop a unique selling proposition (USP): What sets your business apart from the competition? Do you offer faster service, use eco-friendly products, or have a team of particularly skilled snow removal professionals? Your USP will help you stand out in a crowded market.
3. Create a website: A website is a crucial marketing tool for any business, and it's especially important for a service-based business like snow removal. Your website should include information about your services, pricing, and contact information. It should also showcase your USP and any other unique selling points.
4. Utilize social media: Social media platforms like Facebook and Instagram are great ways to reach potential customers and keep them up-to-date on your services. Consider creating a business page on these platforms and posting regular updates, special offers, and helpful tips related to snow removal.
5. Offer seasonal packages: Many people prefer to prepay for snow removal services so they don't have to worry about it during the winter. Consider offering discounted packages for customers who prepay for a certain number of visits or a set amount of time.
6. Partner with local businesses: Building relationships with local businesses can be a great way to get your name out there and potentially gain new customers. Consider offering discounted services to local businesses in exchange for them promoting your services to their employees or customers.
7. Run promotions and offer discounts: Consider running promotions or offering discounts to attract new customers. For example, you could offer a discount to first-time customers or to customers who refer their friends or neighbors.
8. Invest in local advertising: Local advertising can be a great way to reach potential customers in your area. Consider investing in local print or online advertising, or sponsoring a local event or sports team.

I hope this marketing plan helps get your snow removal business off the ground!
